resources.string: The only app that improves your influence with a simple ring
With the Push of a Button
Push, Put to Sleep, Wait 5. it is that simple and instant
Or set push notifications when it is suitable for you
Set push notifications to randomly occur throughout the day
With Plenty of Features in The Future
This is just the alpha, features will be added regularly up until the full release
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
